text: quick question: is that HubSpot search api available yet?
im about to refactor our site search, could keep using bing but would like to see what the new HubSpot search was like
<@U7VHMAX0R> I am working on getting the new search API gated this week after finishing up testing/relevance tuning
<@U7VHMAX0R> If you DM me the portal id you are working on, I'll make sure to have it ready for alpha testing

I’m loading a JS file in the head includes. I am trying to load {{ content.name|striptags }} from that JS file but it is coming up blank.  Do I need to add something to the beginning of the variable to get it from the JS file, or is this something I just can’t access from inside my JS file?
It is rendering blank, but if I do it in the page, it works just fine
I decided to work around and add that variable being added in content settings > footer — but hoping I don’t have to keep my script variables in different places, so if there is a way let me know!
